children.text: An urban campus in the heart of Europe
ENS de Lyon institutional presentation video

Two new ERC Starting Grants for CIRI and LARHRAAccording to the press release issued on September 5, 2025. The European Research Council (ERC) has just announced the list of recipients of Starting Grants for 2025. The Lyon metropolitan area has two projects: one led by François Rousset at the International Centre for Infectious Disease Research in Lyon on conflicts between bacteria and viruses, and the other by Katja Doose at the Rhône-Alpes Historical Research Laboratory on the history of non-Western discourses on environmental change.
